Package pieces

Class Knight

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
pieces.Knight
public class Knight
extends Piece
The Knight class extends to the Piece class and creates and manages a Knight Piece.
Author:
Eric Martz, Minh Huynh

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class pieces.Piece

    color, moved, x, y

    Knight​(int x, int y, java.lang.String color, boolean moved)
    Creates Knight Piece with position and color

    move takes a coordinate and changes the x y values of Knight

    moveCheck takes a coordinate and returns true if the move is valid
    Knight promote​(Piece pawn)
    promote allows a Pawn to be promoted into a Knight

  • Constructor Details

    • Knight

      public Knight​(int x, int y, java.lang.String color, boolean moved)
      Creates Knight Piece with position and color
      Parameters:
      x - X position of Knight
      y - Y position of Knight
      color - Color of Knight (Black or White)
      moved - Boolean which indicates if the piece has ever moved

      Overrides:

      y - int Y coordinate to move to
      Returns:

    • promote

      public Knight promote​(Piece pawn)
      promote allows a Pawn to be promoted into a Knight
      Overrides:
      promote in class Piece
      Parameters:
      pawn - Pawn Piece to be promoted into a Knight
      Returns:
      New Knight Piece to replace Pawn
